title: the United Kingdom from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act
heading: 2. The 15th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 4 of
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which Part 4 of 
the European Union 
the United Kingdom from 
the Withdrawal of 
(Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 March, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th March, 2021.

title: the United Kingdom from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Part 4 of the Withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the European Union 
(Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 provides for miscellaneous amendments to 
the Companies Act 2014 to facilitate the operation of a substitute securities 
settlement system, compatible with the law of the European Union. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [98]
